Join Home Owner Solar Incentives



Why Solar? Why now?

Alberta is a great place to install solar 

Alberta has the 2nd highest yearly potential to produce solar energy in all of Canada! 

Drastically reduce your energy cost

through energy independence as well as grants and incentives 

Protect against rising energy cost

Price increases are likely in the near future with rising carbon tax and removal of price cap,  

Contribute to a sustainable future

About 1,500 trees are saved annually per every 10 panels installed

Recent advancements in Solar technology have allowed it to become the cheapest form of electricity in history. Join the Home Owner Solar Incentives today and invest in a solar system that create power stability, cost savings, and a positive environment impact.
